title: Ep. 100 - Porter Stansberry's Latest Predictions
itunes:title: Porter Stansberry's Latest Predictions
description: In Frank's 100th Episode...Founder of S&A Investment Research, Porter Stansberry, offers ideas on how to protect ourselves from the destruction of the dollar. Since Porter's bold End of America predictions in 2010, European nations are going through a credit crisis - and U.S. debt was downgraded for the first time in history.
content:encoded: In Frank's 100th Episode...Founder of S&A Investment Research, Porter Stansberry, offers ideas on how to protect ourselves from the destruction of the dollar. Since Porter's bold End of America predictions in 2010, European nations are going through a credit crisis - and U.S. debt was downgraded for the first time in history.
